about_the_game:
The Onikira Bonus Contents Pack includes exclusive 74 concept art digital images from Digital Furnace Games.

Contents from this pack can be found in your Steam game directory under Bonus Content.
detailed_description:
The Onikira Bonus Contents Pack includes exclusive 74 concept art digital images from Digital Furnace Games.

Contents from this pack can be found in your Steam game directory under Bonus Content.
name: Onikira - Bonus Contents

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2/ Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB ATI HD3650, 256 MB nVidia 8800 GT, or Intel HD 3000 integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2/ Windows 7/ Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD5000 series or better, nVidia GT400 series or better, Intel IvyBridge integrated graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card

short_description: The Onikira Bonus Contents Pack includes exclusive 74 concept art digital images from Digital Furnace Games. Contents from this pack can be found in your Steam game directory under Bonus Content.
